text: Proco Joe Moreno III (born May 19, 1972) is an American politician. He is the current 1st Ward Alderman of Chicago. He was appointed by Mayor Richard M. Daley on March 26, 2010. The 1st Ward of Chicago incorporates areas including: Wicker Park, Bucktown, East Village, Ukrainian Village, Logan Square and the southeastern tip of Roscoe Village. ==References== Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Chicago City Council members Category:DePaul University alumni Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Proco Joe Moreno
